formElement.documentation: A comma-separated list of up to 200 IDs of the work items to get.
formElement.label: IDs:

formElement.documentation: A comma-separated list of up to 100 fields to get with each work item. If not specified, all fields with values are returned. Calculated fields such as Attached File Count must be specifically queried for using this parameter.
formElement.label: Fields:

formElement.documentation: Gets the work items as they existed at this time.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: Gets the work items as they existed at this time.
formElement.label: As of (date):

formElement.documentation: Gets work item relationships (work item links, hyperlinks, file attachements, etc.).
formElement.label: Expand relationships:

formElement.documentation: Determines if the call will throw an error when encountering a work item (default behavior) that doesn't exist or simply omit it.
formElement.label: Strict mode:

formElement.documentation: Results will be saved into this property/property sheet.
formElement.label: Property sheet name for results:
